content: the entwine sock a little adventure beyond the vanilla version 1 0 © eric lutz 2021 february 2021 the entwine sock introduction in love with self-striping socks but bored with vanilla take a walk on the mildly wild side with this fun little twisted cable sock all sizes and colours are respected here with a teensy lil twist to add a little spice to your knitting this isn t so much a pattern as a recipe - use your favourite cast on and enjoy sizes small - 56 stitches medium - 64 stitches large - 72 stitches extra large - 80 stitches skill level adventurous beginner techniques required magic loop although this pattern is written for cuff down using magic loop there s nothing preventing the knitter from working with double pointed needles small circumference circular needles or any other method with minor modifications - or adapting to toe up although those instructions are not included in this pattern kitchener stitch needles one 40 / 100 cm circular needle in size us 1 5/2 5 mm or use your typical sock knitting needle notions stitch marker cable needle tapestry needle scissor version 1 0 © eric lutz 2021 february 2021 the entwine sock a note on heels there are as many styles and types of heel construction as there are knitters - and far better writers than i have demystified this process rather than include redundant instruction here i suggest you visit those who have more than adequately described the subject below german short row heels https //www sistermountain com/blog/german-short-row-tutorial fish lips kiss heel https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fish-lips-kiss-heel heel flap and gusset https //www moderndailyknitting com/socks-whats-all-the-flap-about/ yarn requirements approximately 90 - 100g of fingering weight yarn appropriate for sock knitting far be it from me to suggest one yarn is better or worse than any other but i m partial to a self-striping yarn for this pattern any sock yarn you select will be wonderful make it special make it meaningful make it uniquely you sample shown in a gingerbread house on bliss base by the cozy knitter process casting on using a stretchy cast on 56 64 72 80 stitches pm for bor and join in the round taking care not to twist your stitches ribbing round 1 * k3 p1 repeat from * to end of round repeat round 1 for 20 rounds or until your preferred length of ribbing is achieved version 1 0 © eric lutz 2021 february 2021 the entwine sock method repeat rounds 1 -
